column4: this might be a little out of scope for this channel but, i want to make a server for my LAN. That is all the technical vocabulary i have on this matter. What i want to do is take a little space from all pcs in my local area network and have them share some folders, the point is a have no idea how to do that because some are ubuntu/linux and some are xp
do you guys have any idea how to start this from an ununtu laptop?
install ubuntu-server and during the install select the samba server install package
install samba on the ubuntu machine and look up a samba guide on google?
